attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to... Contact Sir John Chilcot and REQUEST he is allowed to give his Evidence BEFORE the 2010 General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the interests of DEMOCRACY Gordon Brown should REQUEST that he is allowed to give his evidence to the Iraq Inquiry BEFORE the General Election. If this is not possible Sir John Chilcot should make a public Statement as to WHY this isn't possible.

rejection.details: The PM has already written to Sir John Chilcot to reaffirm the fact that he is willing to give evidence to the inquiry at any time.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
